attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition to the Prime Minister to prevent banks bailed out by the taxpayer paying bonuses to bankers. Why should failure be rewarded, when hard working people are losing their jobs and struggling to feed their famillies. It is morally unacceptable.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
